snippet: MORRIS--Edith (Wolarsky), passed away on March 27, 2016 at the age of 94. Predeceased by her cherished husband of 61 years, Aaron David Morris. Beloved mother of Richard and Linda Morris, Adrienne Morris, Toby and Errol Wind, Deborah and Jeffrey Glickman, six loving grandchildren and six great- grandchildren. Edith lived her life as a beautiful, optimistic, elegant woman. She will be missed by all who loved her and knew her. Donations to Hadassah or Jewish National Fund. 1/3
lead_paragraph: MORRIS--Edith (Wolarsky), passed away on March 27, 2016 at the age of 94. Predeceased by her cherished husband of 61 years, Aaron David Morris. Beloved mother of Richard and Linda Morris, Adrienne Morris, Toby and Errol Wind, Deborah and Jeffrey Glickman, six loving grandchildren and six great- grandchildren. Edith lived her life as a beautiful, optimistic, elegant woman. She will be missed by all who loved her and knew her. Donations to Hadassah or Jewish National Fund. 1/3
